title: EVs that go 1,000 km on a single charge: Gel makes it possible
description: Engineers apply electron beam technology to develop an integrated silicon-gel electrolyte system.

title: Dinosaurs' success helped by specialized stance and gait, study finds
description: Dinosaurs' range of locomotion made them incredibly adaptable, researchers have found.

title: Inexpensive, carbon-neutral biofuels are finally possible
description: When it comes to making fuel from plants, the first step has always been the hardest -- breaking down the plant matter. A new study finds that introducing a simple, renewable chemical to the pretreatment step can finally make next-generation biofuel production both cost-effective and carbon neutral.
